publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2866 Mr Kenneth Macintosh on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Procedures Committee's 2nd Report 2002: Substitution on Committees of the Scottish Parliament—That the Parliament (a) approves the recommendations of the Procedures Committee’s 2nd Report 2002, Substitution on Committees of the Scottish Parliament (SP Paper 530) and agrees to amend the Parliament’s Standing Orders in accordance with Annex A to the Report and (b) agrees that these amendments to the Standing Orders should come into force on 15 March 2002. Supported by: Mr Gil Paterson*
